name: No-Cook Shrimp Salad Wraps

ingredients.name: Guacamole Dip Mix or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
Big Burger Sauce Mix or Pizza Seasoning

preparation: Pinch off and discard shrimp tails. Coarsely chop shrimp. Set aside.
In small bowl, stir together Guacamole Dip Mix, vinegar, and water. Let stand 5 min.
Meanwhile, in large bowl, combine Big Burger Sauce Mix, mayonnaise, hot sauce, and relish. Add shrimp; toss to coat.
Using 4-in-1 Mandoline, julienne cucumber and carrot.
To serve, scoop shrimp into lettuce leaves. Drizzle with sauce.
tips: Go plant-based and swap shrimp for cooked and shelled edamame beans, or tofu.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Big Burger Sauce Mix
summary: The tastiest burger sauce on this side of the golden arches. Best of all, it’s free of sodium and preservatives. Simply mix the seasoning with mayo, ketchup, and relish, and you’ve got saucy goodness to slather on burgers, sandwiches, sausages, and hot dogs.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavours and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
